scripts.predevelop: npm -s run check-usage && npm -s run lint
scripts.develop: npm -s run watch-css && budo $npm_config_ui/index.js:bundle.js --dir $npm_config_ui --dir served --live -- -t [ babelify ] --extension=.jsx
scripts.serve: npm -s run css && budo $npm_config_ui/index.js:bundle.js --dir $npm_config_ui --dir served -- -t [ babelify ] --extension=.jsx
scripts.predist-ui: npm -s run check-usage && npm -s run transpile
scripts.dist-ui: mkdir -p dist/$npm_config_ui && browserify lib/$npm_config_ui/index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/$npm_config_ui/bundle.js && cp $npm_config_ui/index.html dist/$npm_config_ui/ && cp $npm_config_ui/*.css dist/$npm_config_ui/ || :
scripts.predist: npm -s run css && rm -rf dist/fonts && cp -R served/ dist/ && rm -f dist/fonts && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts dist/ && cp dist-index.html dist/index.html
scripts.dist: for ui in *-ui; do npm -s run dist-ui --ui=$ui; done
scripts.deploy: rm -f dist.zip && zip -r dist.zip dist && scp dist.zip aeshin.org: && ssh aeshin.org 'unzip dist.zip && rm -rf eioh && mv dist eioh'
